prodNameC: 美利迪恩EB病毒核抗體檢測系統
ingredientsDesc: .  EBV-NA Substrate Slides: ten Teflon-coated 10-well slides.2.  Guinea Pig Complement (C’), 2 vials, lyophilized 1 mL.3.  Complement Diluent: 1 vial, 5 mL.4.	 Anti-Guinea Pig C3 (fluorescein-labeled), 1 vial, lyophilized, (caprine).   Reconstitute with 3 ml of PBS.5.	 Phosphate Buffered Saline (PBS) Powder: 1 each: Rehydrate to 1 liter     with distilled water.6.	 Positive and Negative Control Sera: 1 vial each, reconstituted with 1 mL PBS to give a 1: 10 working dilution.7.	 Mounting Fluid. 1 bottle, 3 mL.
applicantAddr: 台北市信義區松德路７４號８樓
efficacy: 用來檢測病人血清中之EB病毒核抗原抗體，並加以定量。

mdKind.mdKindMCodeName: C 免疫學及微生物學裝置
